item.title: Leecode.1.Two Sum (两数之和)
item.description: 题目描述： LeetCode第一题，两数之和 Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target

item.title: LeetCode-1128-Number of Equivalent Domino Pairs(等价多米诺骨牌对的数量)
item.description: 题目描述： Given a list of dominoes, dominoes[i] = [a, b] is equivalent to dominoes[j] = [c, d] if and only if either (a==c and b==d), or (a==d and b==c) - that is, one domino can be rotated to be equal to another domino. Return the number of pairs (i, j) for which 0 <= i < j < dominoes.length, and dominoes[i] is equivalent to dominoes[j]. Example
